General.Name: Clover Health Investments Corp
General.Description: Clover Health Investments, Corp. provides medicare advantage plans in the United States. The company through its Clover Assistant, a software platform that provides preferred provider organization and health maintenance organization health plans for medicare-eligible consumers. It also focuses on non-insurance businesses. The company was incorporated in 2014 and is based in Franklin, Tennessee.
General.Address: 725 Cool Springs Blvd, Franklin, TN, United States, 37067
